These filings focus on distributing capital to shareholders and summarising interim performance.
There is no indication of a new product launch or strategic pivot that could act as a catalyst.

near_term_catalysts: A potential announcement of a new dividend or capital‑return plan could trigger a brief rally.
A technical breakout from a prolonged consolidation pattern might provide a short‑term buying signal.
